alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 9:24AM MDT until April 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, some agricultural land between 60th Street North and Interstate 90 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Friday was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 11.8 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sioux River Sioux Falls I-9 12.0 12.1 Fri 10 am 12.0 12.0 11.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
